title: Women's Corduroy Mini Dress Short Sleeve Lapel Zip Up Belted Cowgirl Dresses with Pockets
description: Finding Your Perfect Fit: Ensure you find your ideal size by referring to our size chart in last picture or browsing our size guide in product description, which based on buyers' try on report
Fabric: Crafted from soft corduroy fabric, this retro a-line dress is super soft and comfy, fits perfectly and very flattering
Flattering Deep V Neck: The deep v neck with a half zipper closure creates a chic and alluring silhouette, perfect for making a fashion statement at any event
Adjustable Belt for Slim Fit: The included belt allows for a customizable and flattering slim fit, accentuating the waist and enhancing the overall shape of the dress
Versatile Country Outfit: Embrace a Nashville-inspired look with this above knee length, collared neck dress, perfect for a concert or a casual day out
